title: Ticket #6084: Add ULOG_JOB_AD_INFORMATION to events allowed in nodes.log file
description:
We should probably allow ULOG_JOB_AD_INFORMATION in the nodes log file (this would help with a minor issue LSST is having, and it will probably be good in general). (Most of the time, at least, you won't be getting any job_ad_information events unless you specifically generate them. Although I could see a case where you might want such events in the "regular" user log file but not the nodes.log file.)

Hmm -- maybe we should add a knob to let the user specify "extra" event types that will be allowed in the nodes.log file (we shouldn't let them remove any event types, because that would goof up DAGMan).
